name: Zak Abel
description: '''Zak David Zilesnick''' (born {{birth date|df=yes|1995|3|1}}), better known professionally as '''Zak Abel''', is an English singer, songwriter, and musician. He has also been an English Cadet national table tennis champion. He is known for several songs, such as "Be Kind", "Unstable", "Say Sumthin", and "[[Freedom (Kygo song)|Freedom]]" (as a [[featured artist]] with [[Kygo]]), among others.
